title: Teleology, suffering, and the goodness of being with JP Marceau and Paul Vanderklay.
description:
This is the third part of our on-going discussion about miracles and naturalism. 

Conversation #1 https://youtu.be/GCeHJtdQ0fg
Conversation #2 https://youtu.be/XGoil4zuQPc

This particular discussion is in response to an article written by JP:
This is the article JP wrote for this dia-logos. https://thesymbolicworld.com/articles/evil-enlightenment-and-easter/

You can support my work on Patreon, with the proceeds going into the research I do at the University of Toronto on the Meaning Crisis and the cultivation of wisdom here: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke 

Join the Discord Server to discuss and reflect upon my work: https://discord.gg/MXxRcmv
